name: Dittoverse
description:
Art 107 Section 01 FA 21

This project was made by team Dittoverse consisting of Celena Foglia, Derek Kwok, Vanessa Rivera, and Patrick Moorehead.

Walkthrough Video Here!

NOTE: In the WebGL build, the objects you are able to pick up tend to fall through the floor upon dropping it. This is not intentional and is due to WebGL exporting issues. Currently trying to find a fix. PC and MAC Downloadables are available for better intended experience :) 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Lead Interaction Designer: Celena Foglia

Lead Designer: Derek Kwok

Project Producer: Vanessa Rivera

Lead Unity Designer: Patrick Moorehead

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Keyboard Controls

W/A/S/D - Move Around

W/A/S/D + Shift - Sprint

Mouse Click - Interact

Space - Jump

Escape - Return to main menu

Note: If you press "Quit" in browser it will close the game, refresh the page to fix!
